============================
Lerfu-string: multi-lerfu
============================

# Sequence of BY units (vowel and consonant+y) as a sumti

a by. cy dy. klama
---
(source_file
  (statement (sumti (by)) (selbri (tanru_unit (brivla)))))

# Mixed forms inside le ...

le a by. by a klama
---
(source_file
  (statement (sumti (le) (sumti_tail (selbri (tanru_unit (by))))) (selbri (tanru_unit (brivla)))))
